definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Does she want to have meals here too?
At meal times the odour of sauerkraut vies with that of garlic.
sentences.chinese: 用飯的時候，德國泡菜味和大蒜味爭相散發。

sentences.english: I'll be having dinner at seven o'clock.
They sat down to meat with a distant cousin of the house.
sentences.chinese: 他們便坐下來，同一個遠房表親一起用飯。

sentences.english: Our house isn't big , so we often have meals in the living room .
sentences.chinese: 我們的房子不大，所以我們經常在客堂用飯。
